# Academy (Building)
## Overview
**Academy**

**Create** 120 Goods, 16 Influence, 109 Labor, 3 Magic (5,360 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Alchemy Lab (Room)|Alchemy Lab]], 2 [[Bath (Room)|Baths]], 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 1 [[Bell Tower (Room)|Bell Tower]], 1 [[Book Repository (Room)|Book Repository]], 1 [[Bunks (Room)|Bunks]], 2 [[Classroom (Room)|Classrooms]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 1 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyard]], 1 [[Greenhouse (Room)|Greenhouse]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Observation Dome (Room)|Observation Dome]], 2 [[Office (Room)|Offices]], 1 [[8 - Scriptorium|Scriptorium]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], 1 [[Statue (Room)|Statue]]

An institution of higher learning.
